"Slow and Steady" by Joshua Wilson

The story headline is "A Garish Hack". 
The release number is 0 

Include Vorple Element Manipulation by Juhana Leinonen.

When play begins:
	execute JavaScript command "//initializing vorple, not actually doing anything here.";

Boring Room is a room.  "You are in an exceedingly quiet room.  You can hear your heart beating.  =!;Thump-thump.  =!;Thump-thump.  =!;Thump-thump.".  The printed name of the Boring Room is "A Slow, Boring Room".
